  The Early Show | CBS Evening News | 48 Hours | 60 Minutes | The Saturday Early Show | CBS Sunday Morning | Face The Nation 





Beyond The 
      Boardwalk
Saturday, 
      May 19, at 10 p.m. ET/PT
Atlantic 
      City is 
      a place to escape—a fantasy land of beaches, casinos, and 
      hotels.
 
But 
      it’s also a place where women are falling into a trap, set by a serial 
      killer. There are four victims, found amid some strange clues: all were 
      discovered in a ditch in nearby Egg Harbor Township, all facing to the east, 
      all with no shoes. 
 
Can 
      cops beat the odds and catch the Atlantic City killer before he strikes 
      again?
 
Correspondent 
      Harold Dow reports 
      for 48 Hours 
      Mystery, 
      this Saturday, May 19, at 10 p.m. ET/PT.
